title: Remove caffeine.ai footer credit from EndScreen

requirements.summary: Remove the caffeine.ai “Built with …” footer/credit from the final EndScreen while keeping the rest of the end screen unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The EndScreen slide no longer renders any footer/credit section containing the text “Built with”, “caffeine.ai”, or a link to https://caffeine.ai/.
The end screen still shows the outcome emoji/message, optional heart row (for the 'ofc' path), the visual effects, and the “Start Over” button with unchanged behavior.
A user viewing the deployed app cannot see any “created by/built with caffeine.ai” branding anywhere on the end screen.

file_operations.description: Remove the footer/credit JSX that renders “Built with … using caffeine.ai” (including the external link and copyright line) from the EndScreen component, ensuring the outcome emoji/message, optional heart row (for 'ofc'), visual effects, and Start Over button remain unchanged.
